text: Ganga Narayan Shrestha (Nepali: गंगानारायण श्रेष्ठ) is Nepalese politician and member of the Bagmati Provincial Assembly. He is currently serving as Minister for Internal Affairs and Law of Bagmati Province. == References == Category:Nepalese politicians Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ganga Narayan Shrestha
